module.name: risk_management
module.keywords: module, risk management, risk identification, risk impact, risk classification

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of concepts associated with the management of risk over the full life cycle of a system.
Annex F provides a concept model that shows the risk capabilities provided by ISO 10303-233 and its dependent modules.

inscope.li: facility to assign property type information to risk management data;
facility to assign product type information to risk management data;
facility to assign activity type information to risk management data;
facility to assign activity method type information to risk management data;
facility to assign resource type information to risk management data;
facility to assign document type information to risk management data;
facility to assign person and organization type information to risk management data;
facility to assign event type information to risk management data;
facility to assign condition type information to risk management data;
facility to assign justification type information to risk management data;
facility to assign value with unit type information to risk management data;
facility to assign approval type information to risk management data;
facility to assign state definition type information to risk management data;
facility to assign date and time type information to risk management data.

outscope.li: the process to identify source of risk;
the process used to estimate values for probability and to determine consequences of risk;
the process used to determine classification of risk;
risk evaluation or the process of comparing the estimated risk against given risk criteria to determine the significance of risk, which may be used to assist in the acceptance or treatment decision;
risk communication or the exchange or sharing of information about risk between the decision-maker and other stakeholders;
risk control or the actions implementing risk management decisions;
the development of a risk management system;
risk financing or the provision of funds to meet the cost of implementing risk treatment and related costs.
